activities:
Our customers may use our service to collect information about the Internet usage and location of Wi-Fi-enabled devices near and within their facilities. If Wi-Fi device users choose to join our customers' guest Wi-Fi networks, those users may voluntarily provide personal information to our customer, which we store on behalf of our customers. We may also store personal information transferred to us by our customers, the details of which would be described in their own privacy policies.
In addition, our customers may use our service to analyze shopping patterns like foot traffic counts, sales performance, shopping paths through a retail store. They may also use video recording for loss prevention and safety purposes.
eucountries: France, Germany, Italy, Netherlands, Poland, Spain, United Kingdom
personaldata: On-line, some manually-processed data to audit data for correctness
recoursemech: If a complaint or dispute cannot be resolved through our internal process, we agree to participate in the dispute resolution procedures of the American Arbitration Association (ICDR/AAA Safe Harbor Program, http://go.adr.org/safeharbor) pursuant to the Safe Harbor Principles.
